1) Name/Nickname/Screen name whatever

2) How did you =93disco=
ver=94 the Shinsengumi?

Research. For the RPG I'm in (isn't that fun?) and=
 well, Rurouni Kenshin. I noticed that it's usually the precursor to most S=
hinsengumi fans, myself included, unless they have access to NHK (or were p=
aying attention, at least ^^;;). We have NHK here but, regrettably, I wasn'=
t watching closely enough to have seen the series coming... :'(

----------=

3) Do you have a favorite Shinsengumi member? Why?

=
Isn't it quite obvious? :D I have an irrepressible flair for the dramatic. =
And as all fangirls go... *squee*! Kidding. I really don't know; maybe beca=
use I admire his strength and his genius. The ferocity that's hidden behind=
 that amiable face. As I said, an "irreressible flair for the dramatic".
 
=
And Saitoh. He creeps the hell out of me. Sheer viciousness. He's not just =
your typical bad boy (don't we just love those?)
 
------------------------=
-------

ngumi-centric?
